a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}aš-šur-EN-KALAG-an lu-u DI-mu a-na MAN EN-ia {d}AG u {d}AMAR.UTU a-na MAN EN-ia lik-ru-bu ina UD 22-KAM ana-ku nu-uk la-al-lik-ka IGI.2-MEŠ ša MAN EN-ia la-mur {1}ka-ku-la-nu {LU₂}qur-bu-te a-na ir-ti-ia TA lib-bi {URU}x-li-te u₂-sa-hi-ra-a-ni ma-a a-lik {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ-ka pa-ṭi-ir šum₂-mu la il-li-ku ma-a {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ-ka ina bu-bu-te i-mut-tu₂ x x x ša 05 ITI-MEŠ {ŠE}tab-ku a-tan-na-šu₂-nu 01 qa-a.a I₃-MEŠ 01 qa-a.a NINDA-MEŠ 01 qa-a.a {U₂}ZAG.HI.LI{SAR} x x i-se-niš a-tan-na-šu₂-nu x x x ha-ra-me-ma ana-ku at-tu-ṣi x x UGU {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ x x x x x-tar-bu x x x x x x-ti x+x x x x x x-ni-tu x x x x x ku-um šu₂-nu x x ina bat-ti-bat-ti ša {URU}x x kam-mu-su TA IGI ku-pe-e la i-lak-ka šu₂-nu la x x x u₂-ma-a an-nu-rig x x x TA {1}ka-ku-la-a-ni a-na URU i-tal-lu-ku i-ru-bu o ša MAN be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni o ma-a a-ta-a {LU₂}GAL-E₂-ka {LU₂}GAL-E₂-ka ina lib-bi la-šu 10 {LU₂}EN-x ša a-na MAN EN-ia a-qa-bu-u-ni ša-mu-ru a-dan-niš ši-a-hu šu-u₂ a-na MAN EN-ia a-sa-par-ra
